operations.description: Registers the subscription for the Compute Limit resource provider and enables the management of compute limit resources.
operations.displayName: Registers the Compute Limit Resource Provider
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/register/action

operations.description: Reads all available operations for the Microsoft.ComputeLimit resource provider.
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/operations/read

operations.description: Reads guest subscriptions for a given host subscription within a location.
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/locations/guestSubscriptions/read

operations.description: Adds a subscription as a guest to consume a host subscription's shared compute limits.
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/locations/guestSubscriptions/write

operations.description: Removes a subscription as a guest preventing it from consuming the host subscription's shared compute limits.
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/locations/guestSubscriptions/delete

operations.description: Lists all compute shared limits a host subscription shares with its guest subscriptions.
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/locations/sharedLimits/read

operations.description: Enables sharing of a compute limit by a host subscription with its guest subscriptions.
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/locations/sharedLimits/write

operations.description: Disables sharing of a compute limit by a host subscription with its guest subscriptions.
operations.name: Microsoft.ComputeLimit/locations/sharedLimits/delete
